resources.string: Hey my name is Kiara. I am 14 years old. Everybody teases me by calling me tiara but I think I have a nice name. I like to dance a lot. I keep dancing always. Mumma says I should take rest also but I want to become the best dancer when I grow up. I also like to run a lot. My teacher says I am the fastest in my class. Beating boys is fun, they get very angry when they loose from a girl. I like pink color a lot. I have a pink bag and shoes, my favorite. Its now 7am in the morning and it is time for me to go to school. And my mom is calling me. So, yeah. See you!

Hey I am Raj. I am 14 years old. I like to swim and play basketball. I am very tall in my class and everybody loves to have me in their team. I also like to play Table tennis. My mumma makes me eat lots of veggies, but I do not like them. She says they are important since I like to play so much and I am growing up. My favorite color is black and I always like to wear it. Its now 7am in the morning and it is time for me to go to school. And my mom is calling me. So, yeah. See you!
